english: This happens to many black men of certain breeds .
chinese: 这对某些种族的黑人来说很普遍。

english: They are the natural gestures of an inferior race .
chinese: 这些不过是劣等种族的自然表现。

english: Some ancient thing out of the past of his people was alive in him .
chinese: 他们那个种族的人昔日的遭遇，仍然历历在目。

english: The ainu settlers in hokkaido are the last remnant of a prehistoric race .
chinese: 北海道的阿伊努人是史前某个种族的最后残存者。

english: The love interests cut across cultural and racial lines in the stories .
chinese: 在这些故事里，爱情的追求冲破了不同文化和不同种族的界线。
种族的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: To genuine proselytes of whatever race, judaism long held out welcoming arms .
chinese: 对于任何种族的真心诚意地改变信仰的人，犹太教久已伸出欢迎的手臂。

english: Chingachgook arose, and for a single instant the ancient animosity of tribes was forgotten in a feeling of color .
chinese: 钦加哥站了起来，种族的感情使他一时忘记了部落之间根深蒂固的仇恨。

english: May hap they will rebirth the soul of a nation
chinese: 也许它还会唤醒一个种族的灵魂。

english: Children of many races attend the school
chinese: 到这个学校上学的有许多种族的儿童。

english: A member of the predominant ethnic group of iran
chinese: 法尔西人伊朗主要种族的一员

english: Just as coleman had run from a world bound by race
chinese: 就象寇门一样，逃离里种族的束缚

english: Because dracula is the progenitor of the vampire race ,
chinese: 因为德古拉是吸血鬼种族的起源

english: Just as coleman had run from a world bound by race
chinese: 就象寇门一样，逃离里种族的束缚

english: So far it ' s been the only way to propagate the race
chinese: 迄今为止这是唯一繁衍种族的方法

english: We are living in a multiethnical society
chinese: 我们生活在一个多元种族的社会。
